lead_paragraph: Groups opposed to a Washington State same-sex law say that under the First Amendment, those who signed ballot-initiative petitions have the right to privacy.

headline.seo: Supreme Court to Rule on Secrecy of Petition Names
headline.main: Court to Rule on Right to Privacy for Referendum Petition Signers
